home about blog projects

Hi there! I'm Richard and this is my website. Personally and professionally my top focus is to learn and be a sponge to everything.I believe if we aren't learning, we aren't thriving. I love problem solving with technology, which I get to do in my work every day at Slack.


Check out my about page to learn more about me, and this post if you want to know why I built this site!

this website

I love learning – it’s my favourite thing to do. I feel like I have a solid foundation in CS and IT but my work has been all over the place and I’ve been poor at documenting since I left school. Putting something like this on display means I hold my self accountable to continued learning.
